Uses of Class
org.pepstock.charba.client.impl.charts.Threshold

  • Packages that use Threshold 
    Package Description
    org.pepstock.charba.client.impl.charts
    Contains METER and GAUGE charts implementations (based on controllers), available out-of-the box.

    • Uses of Threshold in org.pepstock.charba.client.impl.charts

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Threshold GaugeDataset.getCurrent()
      Returns the current threshold.

      Creates a new threshold cloning the constant one.

      Sets the color of threshold.

      Sets the value of threshold.
